questions.text: Who can see your Instagram story if your profile is public?
answers: Only people with an Instagram account

questions.text: What happens when you delete an old social media post?
answers: It may still exist in screenshots or shared versions
It is automatically removed from search engines

questions.text: Why can a public profile be problematic?
answers: Strangers can use information for fake profiles or scams

questions.text: Which information is especially sensitive when shared publicly?
Why can posting vacation photos in real time be risky?
answers: Strangers know you are not at home

questions.text: Which combination of information is especially critical?
What is a typical sign of a fake profile?
answers: Many followers but very few posts

questions.text: Why do fake profiles often write in a very friendly or personal way?
What is the safest reaction to a suspicious contact request?
Why can old social media posts become problematic later?
answers: Employers or universities might see them

questions.text: What best describes the term "digital identity"?
answers: Everything that can be found about you online

questions.text: Which action helps most to protect your digital identity?
answers: Using public profiles on all platforms
Only liking posts instead of commenting
